00010 class CMFileType implements CMClass {
00011  
00018  public static function GetMimeTypeForExtension($ext) {
00019   $mimeTypes = array(
00020    'jpg' => 'image/jpg',
00021    'jpeg' => 'image/jpg'
00022   );
00023   
00024   // see if we have this file extension
00025   $ext = strtolower($ext);
00026   if(isset($mimeTypes[$ext]))
00027    return $mimeTypes[$ext];
00028    
00029   // we don't know what this extension is
00030   return false;
00031  }
00032  
00039  public static function GetClassForExtension($ext) {
00040   $exts = array(
00041    '.csv'       => 'CMFileCSV',
00042    '.ical'      => 'CMFileICAL',
00043    '.icalendar' => 'CMFileICAL',
00044    '.ics'       => 'CMFileICAL',
00045    '.ifb'       => 'CMFileICAL',
00046    '.vcard'     => 'CMFileVCF',
00047    '.vcf'       => 'CMFileVCF',
00048   );
00049   
00050   // see if we have a class for this file extension
00051   $ext = strtolower($ext);
00052   if(isset($exts[$ext]))
00053    return $exts[$ext];
00054    
00055   // we don't know what this file is
00056   return false;
00057  }
00058  
00062  public function __toString() {
00063   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00064  }
00065  
00066 }
